Mr. Speaker, I am pleased to support H.R. 5143, the District of  Columbia Policing Protection Act of 2025. This bill repeals subtitle S  of the Comprehensive Policing and Justice Reform Amendment Act of 2022  and replaces it with policies empowering police to pursue a suspect  fleeing in a vehicle.
